release.notes: D1- Fix for PetDragon plugin, added /sm dragon to silence EnderDragons, added new update checker. Added colorful_console config. D2-Fixes EnderDragons, with "/sm dragon" command, and also monitors dragons when a chunk unloads, and when a new one is spawned, to fix an issue with the PetDragon plugin. D3-Added tab complete for commands. D4-Minor tweaks to serialize code.

developer.notes: D1 Minor changes to UpdateChecker Notifications. D2 Switching translations from yaml to i18n. D3
